name: 12 hours to end the world
description:
This is the most recent version of the game "12 Hours To End The World" made for the Revscarecrow gamejam.

This game works based played without fullscreen so if you can't see the button to fullscreen it that is intended. If those two things in the right side of the screen are bothering you, those are from Itch and not me. You can remove them with the element zapper in UBlock Origin or some other adblocker. If you wait 41.3 seconds at the true end screen theres a secret. TWs are on the first page.

There is one error I can't seem to remove, if you see problems and or have suggestions for ways to improve the game feel free to tell me! This is the first game I have ever made and it's been a blast.
